Package com.tecchtitans.eng1

Class ENGGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.Game
      • com.tecchtitans.eng1.ENGGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
    public class ENGGame
extends com.badlogic.gdx.Game
    Extends the Game class. Contains the ECS engine that is used for running most game logic, along with other aspects of the program such as the audio manager and the screens that can be displayed in the program, along with being able to switch the currently displayed screen. //* @see com.badlogic.gdx.Game

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.badlogic.gdx.Game

      • getEngine

        public ECSEngine getEngine()
        Returns the respective ECSEngine the game is using.
        Returns:
        engine as an ECSEngine.

      • getAudioManager

        public AudioManager getAudioManager()
        Returns the respective AudioManager the game is using.
        Returns:
        audio manager as an AudioManager.

      • switchToMainMenu

        public void switchToMainMenu()
        Switches the currently displayed screen to the main menu.

      • switchToPlayScreen

        public void switchToPlayScreen()
        Switches the currently displayed screen to the play screen.

      • switchToGameOverScreen

        public void switchToGameOverScreen()
        Switches the currently displayed screen to the game over screen.

      • create

        public void create()
        Called when application is first created. Initialises the audio manager, main menu screen, play screen, and game over screen. Also sets up the ECS engine. Finally, it will set the current screen to the main menu.

      • setupEngine

        public void setupEngine()
        Initialises the ECSEngine with the systems required for the game to function. These include the InputSystem, PlayerSystem, CollisionSystem, PlayerMovementSystem, PlayerCameraSystem, UIRenderSystem, and GameSystem.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Re-initialises all screens and calls setupEngine to re-initialise engine. Also stops any music that may be playing in the audio manager.

      • render

        public void render()
        Calls the render method in the parent class Game. //* @see Game
        Specified by:
        render in interface com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
        Overrides:
        render in class com.badlogic.gdx.Game

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Specified by:
        dispose in interface com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
        Overrides:
        dispose in class com.badlogic.gdx.Game
